alert.note: Alert for Coastal Hillsborough; Coastal Pasco; Inland Hillsborough; Inland Pasco; Pinellas (Florida) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 14 at 8:11PM EDT by NWS Tampa Bay
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of Pasco, northern Pinellas and northwestern Hillsborough Counties through 845 PM EDT... At 810 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm near Citrus Park, or 10 miles northeast of Clearwater, moving northwest at 20 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 50 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Tampa, Clearwater, Largo, Temple Terrace, New Port Richey, Lutz, Holiday, Hudson, St. Petersburg, St. Leo, Palm Harbor, New Port Richey East, Tampa International Airport, East Lake-Orient Park, Land O Lakes, Egypt Lake-Leto, Greater Carrollwood, University, Wesley Chapel South and Keystone. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...50 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Torrential rainfall is also occurring with this storm and may lead to localized flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways. Frequent cloud to ground lightning is occurring with this storm. Lightning can strike 10 miles away from a thunderstorm. Seek a safe shelter inside a building or vehicle.

area.areaDesc: Coastal Hillsborough; Coastal Pasco; Inland Hillsborough; Inland Pasco; Pinellas
